mapper.insert: insert into tbl_system (sys_id, sys_name, sys_img, page_line, AppID, AppSecret, bar_Name) values (#{sysId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageLine,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appsecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{barName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tbl_system set sys_name = #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_img = #{sysImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_line = #{pageLine,jdbcType=TINYINT}, AppID = #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AppSecret = #{appsecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bar_Name = #{barName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sys_id = #{sysId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sys_id, sys_name, sys_img, page_line, AppID, AppSecret, bar_Name from tbl_system
